description:
From the underworld comes a princess...
Destiny has brought her here...
After chasing the evil Gilva into the human world, Sheliss, the Underworld princess, and the demon killer Akane Kido move in on their enemy's hide-out, but are defeated by the aquatic magician Meduna. Sheliss' dress is ripped off during a heated battle and slimy tentacles penetrate her every orifice. The magician turns her clit into a cock and she takes Gilva's virginity as their as their tight little pussies are aching to be pinned downed and spread open. Her strong will is overtaken by milky white pleasures and rationality fades away from her eyes....
title: The Night When Evil Falls Vol.II
